title: Shiny App: Risk Management in Portfolio Analysis
description: An app to democratize the more in-depth study of quantitative portfolio analysis and risk management.
contents:
The app
As I was learning and constructing my scripts for financial risk forecasting methods, I realized I was always running the same scripts over and over again to study the stock arket. So I decided to do an app to automate this process, but then, it struck me: “I don’t think I’ve ever seen a website that does what this does.” So, this app is an attempt to construct a basic platform for R-users to build financial models for stocks in a reproducible manner for other users to enjoy!
This is the link to the app, for now.
